speaker.whotheyare: Menno Schilthuizen studies the animals and plants in cities and how they adapt to their new urban habitat.
speaker.whylisten: Menno Schilthuizen engages citizens in research projects and "taxon expeditions" to study plants and animal evolution in their own urban neighborhoods. Schilthuizen is a researcher at Naturalis Biodiversity Centre and a professor of evolution and biodiversity at Leiden University in the Netherlands. His books have been translated into twelve languages.
